content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello, Emilia. It's a pleasure to meet you. I understand that you're interested in renting my apartment in Duisburg. Let's discuss the price. What is your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I would like to rent the apartment for 500 euros a month. It's in the center of the city and has everything nearby. I'm a responsible and dependable student. I will pay the rent on time every month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but 500 euros is too low for this apartment. It's a newly built unit in the city center, and I'm looking to get a fair market price. How about we start at 700 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, Herr Schmidt. However, I am a student and I have to consider my budget. I would like to propose 600 euros a month. I will take good care of the apartment and respect your rules.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 600 euros is still below my asking price. I have to cover my costs and make a profit. Let's meet in the middle at 650 euros per month. This is a fair price considering the location and the quality of the apartment. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Herr Schmidt. I appreciate your fairness. I agree to the price of 650 euros a month. I will sign the lease agreement and pay the deposit as soon as we agree on the conditions.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 650 euros! Please provide me with your contact information, and we can proceed with the lease agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Herr Schmidt. My email address is emilia.mueller@example.com. I'm looking forward to renting your apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Excellent, Emilia. I'll send you the lease agreement via email. Please review it and let me know if you have any questions. Once you sign it and send it back, we'll proceed with the deposit and the first month's rent. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
